thread.section_title: SelfStorage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SelfStorage.com | www.selfstorage.com | 6 of 630
thread.title: Chris H

author: Chris H
title: Chris H
text: We were trying to set up short notice storage for a travel trailer we had just purchased on a Saturday. We called one place and was rudely told they were closed, then we called Storage West in Tempe. Christy and Eric are a married couple that run the place and they have been so sweet from the very start, and we can tell they really enjoy their jobs. A simple tour to get familiar with the place, the friendly smiles, offers for help, the clean and secure facility, all of the little touches really make a difference. Thanks guys!
